body_html:
We should avoid operations that may copy the whole tensor in printing code. At most the extra memory used should be proportional to the data that's actually printed.

Printing a big tensor shouldn't cause an OOM.
body_text:
We should avoid operations that may copy the whole tensor in printing code. At most the extra memory used should be proportional to the data that's actually printed.
Printing a big tensor shouldn't cause an OOM.
body:
We should avoid operations that may copy the whole tensor in printing code. At most the extra memory used should be proportional to the data that's actually printed.

Printing a big tensor shouldn't cause an OOM.
